text: Trent Deshawn Pollard (born November 20, 1972) is a former American football offensive lineman. He played three seasons with the NFL's Cincinnati Bengals. After his playing career, Pollard became a football coach at his alma mater, Rainier Beach High School in Seattle. His wife, Ericka Johnson Pollard, is a teacher at B. F. Day Elementary School.Remembering his classroom hero == References == Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:American football offensive guards Category:Eastern Washington Eagles football players Category:Cincinnati Bengals players Category:Players of American football from Washington (state) Category:Sportspeople from Seattle
title: Trent Pollard
